name: CUBETHON 2.0
description: Lets get the obvious out of the way. My first unity game, check. I followed Brackeys beginner tutorials, check. And i think thats it. So yeah, at the end of the tutorial series, i was not done, so i just added a bit more stuff, like a level select screen, hmm , two worlds with five levels each. Yeah i think thats it. Hope you enjoy.
